Learning_Security_SegmentObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Learning_Security_SegmentObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Learning_Security_SegmentObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Identifies security segment topics using unique references for updates. Leave blank when creating security segment topics. For update, the IDs corresponding to learning topic security segment.

Learning_Topic_Security_Segment_Data.description: The Name of the learning topic security segment which acts as it's ID. This value must be unique
Learner user groups who can access content that you secure to this segment.

Learning_CatalogObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Learning_CatalogObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Learning_Topic_Security_Segment_Data.description: The learning catalogs(s) referenced by the learning topic security segment

Learning_TopicObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Learning_TopicObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
